items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js backend designed to demonstrate CI/CD pipeline automation. This repository focuses on building, testing, containerization, and seamless deployment to a Kubernetes cluster with a fully automated CI/CD pipeline.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: SelfHost-DL is my project that lets users self-host a simple web downloader with minimal setup. Just run it with Node.js—no third-party services needed. Deploy the files, start the server, and download content easily. Perfect for a lightweight, self-managed solution.
items.title: 000mistra000/selfhost-dl: SelfHost-DL is my project that lets users self-host a simple web downloader with minimal setup. Just run it with Node.js—no third-party services needed. Deploy the files, start the server, and download content easily. Perfect for a lightweight, self-managed solution.

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight, fastest and efficient GitHub Action built with TypeScript + Micromatch to filter file changes in a Pull Request (PR). This action allows you to detect changes in code, documentation, or specific directories, helping you trigger conditional CI/CD workflows.
items.title: JagjeevanAK/path-filter: A lightweight, fastest and efficient GitHub Action built with TypeScript + Micromatch to filter file changes in a Pull Request (PR).  This action allows you to detect changes in code, documentation, or specific directories, helping you trigger conditional CI/CD workflows.

items.content_html: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX. It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead. Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.
items.title: Bhargavxyz738/Lazy-CSS: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX.  It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead.  Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.
